entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers or periods of drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers or periods of drizzle ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023
